Summary:
The CL and EL team meetings are summarized in files using Markdown format. 

[[
## Summary
]]


Status of Ethereum 2.0 Phase 1 is being finalized before the mainnet launch.
Several issues were discussed regarding the Beacon Chain, including 
the need to update the deposit contract for Shanghai upgrade.

A new version of the Deposit Contract has been proposed and will be reviewed by the team soon.


The CL/EL meeting was skipped this week due to a scheduling conflict.
